metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8369 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in include/top_graph_header.php in Cacti 0.8.8fand earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands viathe rra_id parameter in a properties action to graph.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8369` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8f+ds1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8f+ds1-3').
